ovdesc.p: Parameters for mapping source file to MI.AUTO.ENTRY.

desc.p: Reserved for future use.
Type of netting required.
5 alphabetic characters.
Must be a record on MI.NETTING.PARAMS or NONE.
Defaults to NONE.
Reserved for future use.
Reserved for future use.
Reserved for future use.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Name of field on underlying file.

Conditional statement of the form: IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" BBB CCC If the conition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.

Conditional statement of the form: IF SIGN EQ "VALUE" BBB CCC This form is used for selecting a debit/credit field. SIGN is the word SIGN (not in quotes). VALUE is "CR" or "DR" BBB & CCC are fields on the underlying file.
Reserved for future use.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
Name of field on underlying file. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.

Conditional statement of the form: Multivalue 1 - IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" Multivalue 2 - BBB Multivalue 3 - CCC If the condition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
Name of field on underlying file. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.

Conditional statement of the form: Multivalue 1 - IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" Multivalue 2 - BBB Multivalue 3 - CCC If the condition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
Name of field on underlying file. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.

Conditional statement of the form: Multivalue 1 - IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" Multivalue 2 - BBB Multivalue 3 - CCC If the condition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file. Defaults to 1.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
Name of field on underlying file. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.

Conditional statement of the form: Multivalue 1 - IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" Multivalue 2 - BBB Multivalue 3 - CCC If the condition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Reserved for future use.
Reserved for future use.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file. Defaults to local currency.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
Name of field on underlying file. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.

Conditional statement of the form: Multivalue 1 - IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" Multivalue 2 - BBB Multivalue 3 - CCC If the condition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Date generation process was last run. Null if the MI.AUTO.ENTRY file has been cleared.
Standard T24 date field.
Noinput field.

Conditional statement of the form: Multivalue 1 - IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" Multivalue 2 - BBB Multivalue 3 - CCC If the condition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.
The name of the source file to which record relates
Must be a record on FILE.CONTROL.
Reserved for future use.
The field on the source file which holds the reversal marker. If there is a value in this field on the incoming record then it is treated as a reversal (credits are negative).
Up to 30 alphabetic characters.

Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file. Defaults to the account officer for the customer.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
Name of field on underlying file. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.

Conditional statement of the form: Multivalue 1 - IF AAA OPERATOR "VALUE" Multivalue 2 - BBB Multivalue 3 - CCC If the condition is true then field BBB will be used otherwise field CCC is selected. AAA, BBB, CCC are fields on the underlying file. OPERATOR is one of the standard T24 operands EQ, LE, LT, GE, GT, NE VALUE is a literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, or names of fields on the underlying file. Unlike other mapping fields no decision statements are allowed.
Mandatory if a literal value has been entered in the CURRENCY field which is not the local currency.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Name of field on underlying file.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, or names of fields on the underlying file. Unlike other mapping fields no decision statements are allowed. Mandatory field.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Name of field on underlying file.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, or names of fields on the underlying file. Unlike other mapping fields no decision statements are allowed.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes.
Name of field on underlying file.
Selection criteria for processing records on the source file.
If no selection is specified all records will be processed.
UniVerse SELECT command up to 30 characters
Name of routine prefixed with @. This will be called with two arguments; date to process from and a list of keys returned.
Mapping field. This may contain literal values, names of fields on the underlying file, or decisions for using one of two fields on the underlying file.
Literal value enclosed in double quotes. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
Name of field on underlying file. Data may only be entered in the first multivalue.
